members.name: getMinWaitTime
members.comment: Get the minimum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting. The default is 100 ticks (5 seconds). Note that this is before applying lure.

return: Minimum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting

members.name: setMinWaitTime
members.comment: Set the minimum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting. The default is 100 ticks (5 seconds). Note that this is before applying lure.

param: minWaitTime - Minimum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting

members.name: getMaxWaitTime
members.comment: Get the maximum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting. The default is 600 ticks (30 seconds). Note that this is before applying lure.

return: Maximum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting

members.name: setMaxWaitTime
members.comment: Set the maximum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting. The default is 600 ticks (30 seconds). Note that this is before applying lure.

param: maxWaitTime - Maximum number of ticks one has to wait for a fish biting

members.name: getApplyLure
members.comment: Get whether the lure enchantment should be applied to reduce the wait time. The default is true. Lure reduces the wait time by 100 ticks (5 seconds) for each level of the enchantment.

return: Whether the lure enchantment should be applied to reduce the wait time

members.name: setApplyLure
members.comment: Set whether the lure enchantment should be applied to reduce the wait time. The default is true. Lure reduces the wait time by 100 ticks (5 seconds) for each level of the enchantment.

param: applyLure - Whether the lure enchantment should be applied to reduce the wait time

members.name: getBiteChance
members.comment: Gets the chance of a fish biting. 0.0 = No Chance. 1.0 = Instant catch.

members.name: setBiteChance
members.comment: Sets the chance of a fish biting. 0.0 = No Chance. 1.0 = Instant catch.

throws: IllegalArgumentException - if the bite chance is not between 0 and 1

members.name: isInOpenWater
members.comment: Check whether or not this fish hook is in open water. Open water is defined by a 5x4x5 area of water, air and lily pads. If in open water, treasure items may be caught.

return: true if in open water, false otherwise

members.name: getHookedEntity
members.comment: Get the entity hooked by this fish hook.

return: the hooked entity. null if none

members.name: setHookedEntity
members.comment: Set the entity hooked by this fish hook.

param: entity - the entity to set, or null to unhook

members.name: pullHookedEntity
members.comment: Pull the hooked entity to the caster of this fish hook. If no entity is hooked, this method has no effect.

return: true if pulled, false if no entity is hooked

members.name: getState
members.comment: Get the current state of this fish hook.
